duration_in_months: While data could suggest this may be a one-time solicitation, multiple contract events from the same Sollicitation number may occur.
tags: The Crown sense ports epperanger dein.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: W8485-247842/B

#### Project Overview

The Department of National Defence invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for the procurement of aircraft equipment, as described below.

#### Items Required

- **Aircraft: [PAKCPACK Packaging & Electrical Assembly Unit US-made]**
  - Part Number: 8927707-1
  - NCAGE Code: 36376
  - Quantity Required: 20 units
  - Delivery Destination: 15 Westwin Ave

Bidders are eligible to provide an Equivalent or a Substitute Product. Please indicate the Part Number and NCAGE code for the product being offered.

#### Documents Required

Documents may be submitted in either English or French, the two official languages of Canada.

#### Additional Information

- The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- A preference will be given to suppliers offering Canadian goods and/or services.
- The delivery will be requested as soon as possible.

#### Contact Information

To obtain a copy of the solicitation documents, please contact:
 Ryan Duncan, Procurement Officer
 Phone: (613) 292-9650
 Email: [Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca)

#### Tender Details

- Tender Reference Number: W8485-247842/B
- Tender Amendment Number: 5
- Solicitation Number: W8485-247842/B
- Publication Date: November 2, 2023
- Tender Closing Date: November 17, 2023, 14:00:00
- The tender document can be downloaded from the following links: 
[Attachment 1 - PDF document in English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23873/w8485-247842-rfp-english.pdf) 
[Attachment 2 - PDF document in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23873/w8485-247842-rfp-french.pdf) 

Note: Trade agreements and regions of opportunity were removed as this information was deemed non-relevant to the tender announcement.
